pr_title: Added testcontainer integration test for Minio

timeline.bodyText: Please don't add credentials to the source code files

replies.bodyText: @omarsmak sure I'll import them from a resource file, Any suggestions regarding above error?
replies.author: Nayananga

replies.bodyText: @Nayananga Try to use something similar to this as I think testcontainer will generate dynamic IP but then needs to be mapped and then something like getContainer(CONTAINER_NAME).getContainerIpAddress(); to access your container's IP
replies.author: omarsmak

timeline.bodyText:
Junit5 is used, would be better to remove public access modifier in all test classes and all tests methods. So they will have default access modifier:
class MinioComponentIntegrationTest extends CamelTestSupport {
timeline.author: DenisIstomin
